entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Hang when HTTP/2 WebSocket connects to a HTTP/1.1 non-TLS kestrel endpoint #80056
  • Safety of Memory.Pin for Memory instances created with CreateFromPinnedArray #80055
  • Cookies lose implicit domain after serialization and adding to container. #80053
  • [.NET 7] - OptionsConfigurationServiceCollectionExtensions.Configure regression #80052
    7.0.x
  • Is it possible to start notepad from a service in the logged on user? #80050
  • [wasm][debugger] Invoke static getter in valuetype not working #80049
  • Getting segfault error 4 in libcoreclr.so #80047
  • [wasm] Does `browser-wasm` officially support web worker environment? #80045
  • [API Proposal]: MathF.Clamp, Math.Lerp, MathF.Lerp, Math.Mod, MathF.Mod #80044
  • [API Proposal]: `System.Decimal` constants #80042
  • PipeReader ReadAsync Do not cover all the case of completion of stream #80039
  • NativeAOT does not honor new() constraint #80037
  • [NativeAOT + Objective-C Marshal] request for advise on restricted GC callouts #80032
  • Need to move off osx.1015.amd64.open queues #80029

Closed

  • [NativeAot + Objective-C Marshal] memory corruption after thin locks were introduced #80031
  • Any plans of deprecation of RijndaelManaged class #80048
  • FromBase64Transform whitespace issue #80040
  • [wasm] RuntimeError: memory access out of bounds - when configured with undefined `asset.name` #77946
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add System.IAction and System.IFunc default interfaces implicitly implemented by all Action and Func delegates #80041

PullRequests

Created

  • SuperPMI: Be more flexible in finding coredistools #80054
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Expand compare + brfalse/brtrue with single conditional branch opcode #80046
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.0
  • Add a test for IndexOfAnyValues.GetValues #80038
    area-System.Memory, 8.0.0
  • WIP: Resolve generic virtual methods in type system #80035
    NO-REVIEW, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Re-enable UploadValues_Success test #80034
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Fix nullable annotations in ITypedList #80033
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Update 10.15 to 12.00 queues #80030

Merged

  • Fix stringification of types in managed type system #80036
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Asserts for externaly configured assets, more pendingDownload #79886
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0

Updated

  • delete enum support for bool as an underlying type #79962
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Make System.Reflection.Emit public types abstract #78544
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono][wasm] Bundle assemblies as WebCIL #79416
    arch-wasm, area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • fix TLS resume with client certificates #79898
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.0
  • Double IndexOf throughput for chars #78861
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Report FOH segments #79985
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Adding support to receive evaluationOptions from dap. #71464
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Forbid creation of non-faulting null-check nodes. #77078
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Replace the last two SIMDIntrinsic in LIR with NamedIntrinsic and delete GT_SIMD #80027
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make textual stack trace metadata smaller #79921
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-29
entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Various fixes and code cleanup #2144
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: merge the change to running tests #2143
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Upgrade to LLVM v15 and opaque pointers #2139
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-29
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Bug when dynamic parameter is passed to an async method #6841

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CSharpAddMissingImportsRefactoringProvider depends on EditorFeature service #66157
  • how can I use assembly as analyzer? #66153
  • Side effects of conditional access on an instance of a nullable type are not preserved in generic code #66152

Closed

  • OverflowOnFluentCall is flaky #65910
    17.5 P3
  • AspNetCore.Mvc.Consumes attribute triggers CA1825 #66150
  • Conditional null access produces weird error for nullable value types #66143

PullRequests

Created

  • Optimize StringBuilder calculations for netcoreapp3.1 and newer #66156
    Area-Compilers
  • Ref safety visitor: replace GetVal and GetRef methods with CheckVal and CheckRef #66155
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to release/dev17.6 #66154
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix Extract Base When Class Has Base #66149
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Reduce amount of stack used by CodeGenerator.EmitInstanceCallExpression #66137
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Correctly parse local function with several async modifiers #66030
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Only examine a PEReference once when walking projects to produce inheritance tree #66043
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.6 #66148
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Correct initial state for nested method nullability analysis #66147
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, 17.5
  • Fix state for pattern declarations on subsequent iterations #66136
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Pattern Matching, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.5
  • Update StreamJsonRpc #66145
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Implement Required Members for VB #66084
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Kestrel config behaves differently when set using env vars vs. in-code #45801
  • [Blazor WASM] An exception occurs while rendering multiple components that use IJSStreamReference #45799
  • Perf regression: json, plaintext_netty #45798
  • Blazor Wasm does not honor binding if previous value is a part of the new value for textarea when using oninput #45797

Closed

  • obsolete EnableDataAnnotationsValidation, requires IServiceProvider now #45783
  • Blazor WASM application hangs on MSAL Authentication. #39104
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Virtualize does not respond to items change after call RefreshDataAsync but when scrolling page #45694
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Create 7.0 project using terminal and run the project using https, the url can't opened. #45336
  • BlazorServer.styles.css #45787

PullRequests

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2075692 #45630
    area-mvc, * NO MERGE *
  • [release/6.0] Update Helix.Common.props #45772
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Fix cookie null regression #45715
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 7.0.x
  • Remove 'max-age' in 'Cache-Control' Response Header when Location is None ('no-cache'). #42706
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Add ambiguous route analyzer #45582
    blocked, area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Don't subscribe to ImmutableBrush #12345
  • VisualElement Background/Shadow `Notify` code creates a strong relationship between the brush and the element #12344
  • Map control MoveToRegion does not work when map is not visible #12342
  • Secure Storage GetAsync on Android Fails To Return Value #12341
  • on Android, VerticalTextAlignement doesn't work with the control : 'Entry' #12339
  • HeadContent not working with maui with blazor #12338
  • Maui Mac OS Ventura Development identifing my App as Malware #12337
  • AppCenter still does dot build MAUI apps .... #12336
  • There is a problem #12334
  • iOS Bundle Resources value not found for GoogleServiceInfo.plist in .net MAUI #12333
  • IsPassword Property of Entry control does not work for the numeric keyboard when set dynamically. #12332
  • MAUI .net 7.0 , App store submission failed bitcode issue December 2022 #12331
  • App crashes on startup when R8 shrinker is set in Maui - Release mode #12330
  • [iOS]Additional space between FlyoutHeader and FlyoutItem in Shell page #12329
  • [Windows] Acrylic backdrops problem with contrast or color #12328
  • Publish as MSIX bundle or APPX bundle for Windows #12327
  • Shell flyout background color does not change in .NET 7.0 #12325

Closed

  • Infinite rendering loop when Rectangle placed in an AbsoluteLayout #12268
  • Using Shapes causes continuous layout recalculation on Android #11704
    Backlog
  • Navigation bar overlaps title bar when replacing MainPage for a MAUI 6.0 Windows App #12255
  • Editor words sometimes out of focus. #12120
  • Refreshing Observable Collection Generates InvalidOperationException #12181
  • ERROR -cannot execute app.dll the selected execution mode is not supported for .net projects #12231
  • RuntimeInformation.RuntimeIdentifier returns wrong version of Maccatalyst in Maui app. #12198
  • Failure to install maui-ios and maui-android workload #12204

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix initial page and back button Navigation events #12348
  • Preventing NullReferenceException on WebAuthenticatorIntermediateActi… #12347
    community ✨
  • Don't watch for changes on an ImmutableBrush #12346
  • Keep handler flyoutview #12343

Merged

  • Remove unnecessary Frame set in Shape #12326

Updated

  • Initial Commit for third party notice file #12321
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #12123
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Invalid object name 'AspNetUserRole'. #29945
  • Avoid OrderBy with Include query duplication #29942
  • DOTNET CORE7+MySQL migrations are failing #29941

Closed

  • Make it clear how to disable LazyLoadOnDisposedContextWarning in the exception message #27255
  • Include( x => x.Child.OrderBy ) does not work in Postgresql #29925
  • Proxies retain a reference to pooled DbContext after it is returned to the pool #25486
    8.0.0
  • Pass query tracking behavior to materialization interceptor #29910
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Set max length for string discriminator properties #29946
  • Allow ignoring non-virtual navigations with lazy-loading proxies #29944
  • Allow lazy-loading to be configured per navigation #29943

Merged

  • Dispose service properties when context is disposed or returned to the pool #29929
  • Flow query tracking behavior to materialization interceptor #29928
